$:/core/macros/tabs.title: $:/core/macros/tabs
$:/core/macros/tabs.text:
\define tabs(tabsList,default,state:"$:/state/tab",class,template,buttonTemplate,retain,actions,explicitState) <$set name="qualifiedState" value=<>> <$set name="tabsState" filter="[<__explicitState__>minlength[1]] ~[]">
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab" storyview="pop"><$set name="save-currentTiddler" value=<>><$tiddler tiddler=<>><$button set=<> setTo=<> default="$default$" selectedClass="tc-tab-selected" tooltip={{!!tooltip}}> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> <$transclude tiddler="$buttonTemplate$" mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="caption"> <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/> $actions$<$link overrideClass="" to=<> >{{$:/core/images/link}}
<$list filter="$tabsList$" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<> default="$default$" retain="""$retain$"""> <$transclude tiddler="$template$" mode="block"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
\end

$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.title: $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to-tabs
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.caption: Link-to-Tabs plugin
$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to.text:
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-all-links" checked="inline-block" unchecked="none" default="none"> Show internal tab link for ''all tabs''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="show-single-link" checked="inline-block" unchecked="none" default="inline-block"> Show internal tab link for ''selected tabs''</$checkbox>

<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="initial-opacity" checked="0" unchecked="0.7" default="0.7"> Tab links are initially hidden and need mouse hover to become visible.</$checkbox> The transition time in seconds is: <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config" field="transition" default="0.3"/>

<$button message="tm-delete-tiddler" param="$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config">
Reset to Default!
</$button>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/history.text:

V <1.0.0

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/styles.text:
.wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-all-links}};
  position: relative;
  top: -1em;
  left: -1.3em;
  font-size: 0.7em;
  opacity: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!initial-opacity}};
  margin-right: -1em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab svg{
  width: 1.4em;
  height: 1.4em;
}

.wltc-link-to-tab:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  transition:opacity {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!transition}}s;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(1,-0.06,.39,.89);
}

.tc-tab-selected + .wltc-link-to-tab {
  display: {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/config!!show-single-link}};
}

.tc-vertical > .wltc-link-to-tab {
  top: -1.9em;
  left: 0;
  height: 0;
  float: right;
}

.tc-search-results .wltc-link-to-tab a {
  display: contents;
  padding: 0;
}

$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/link-to-tabs/readme.text:
This plugin adds a little link icon to every tab.

''Important:'' This plugin changes the core tabs macro.

! Lint-to-Tabs Settings

{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/link-to-tabs}}
